titles.title: JP169 My God is so big.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My God is so big,so strong and so mighty
there's nothing that He cannot do.
My God is so big, so strong and so mighty
there's nothing that he cannot do.
The rivers are His,the mountains are His
the stars are His handiwork too.
My God is so big,so strong and so mighty
there'snothing that He cannot do.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My God is so big,so strong and so mighty
there's nothing that He cannot do.
My God is so big,so strong and so mighty
there's nothing that He cannot do.
He's called us to live for Him every day
In all that you say and all do.
My God is so big,so strong and so mighty
He can do all things through you.
